demos.title: E-commerce Sales Data
demos.description: Customer orders, products, and inventory for testing retail applications and analytics.
demos.prompt: Generate e-commerce sales data with 3 tables: customers (500 records), products (50 items), and orders (1000 transactions). Include realistic pricing, seasonal patterns, and customer behavior like repeat purchases.

demos.title: Employee HR Records
demos.description: Staff data with departments, roles, and performance metrics for HR system testing.
demos.prompt: Create employee database with 200 staff records including departments, job titles, salaries, hire dates, performance ratings, and manager relationships. Include realistic salary ranges by role and tenure.

demos.title: Financial Transactions
demos.description: Banking and payment data for fintech applications and fraud detection systems.
demos.prompt: Generate financial transaction data with 1000 records including account numbers, transaction types, amounts, timestamps, merchant categories, and fraud indicators. Include realistic spending patterns.

demos.title: IoT Sensor Data
demos.description: Time-series sensor readings for smart building and monitoring system development.
demos.prompt: Create IoT sensor dataset with temperature, humidity, and energy readings from 20 devices over 30 days. Include realistic daily/seasonal patterns, occasional sensor failures, and anomalies.

demos.title: Student Performance
demos.description: Academic records with grades and demographics for educational software testing.
demos.prompt: Generate student performance data with 300 students across multiple subjects, including demographics, attendance, assignment scores, exam grades, and GPA calculations with realistic grade distributions.

demos.title: Healthcare Patient Data
demos.description: Medical records with diagnoses and treatments for healthcare system development.
demos.prompt: Create healthcare dataset with 400 patient records including demographics, medical history, diagnoses, treatments, medications, and appointment data. Follow HIPAA-compliant synthetic data patterns.

demos.title: Supply Chain Logistics
demos.description: Shipping and inventory data for warehouse and logistics application testing.
demos.prompt: Generate supply chain data with suppliers, warehouses, products, shipments, and inventory levels. Include 200 suppliers, 50 products, and 500 shipment records with realistic lead times and costs.

demos.title: Social Media Analytics
demos.description: User engagement metrics and content data for social platform development.
demos.prompt: Create social media dataset with 1000 users, posts, comments, likes, and follower relationships. Include engagement patterns, trending topics, and realistic user behavior across demographics.
